pipetime 0.0.1
  • Reference
  • Articles
    • introduction

    Time operations in a pipeline Measure how long a data operation or function takes within a pipeline (|>). This can be used to check performance of steps in your data workflow.

    time_pipe.Rd

    Time operations in a pipeline Measure how long a data operation or function takes within a pipeline (|>). This can be used to check performance of steps in your data workflow.

    time_pipe(
  .data,
  action = NULL,
  label = NULL,
  log_file = NULL,
  console = TRUE,
  time_unit = c("secs", "millisecs", "mins")
)

    Arguments

    .data

    A data object to pass through the pipeline.

    action

    Optional. A function call to apply to .data. If not provided, the function will time .data itself.

    label

    Optional. A descriptive name for the operation. If not provided, a name will be generated automatically.

    log_file

    Optional. File path to write timing logs. If NULL, messages are only printed to the console.

    console

    Logical. Whether to print timing messages to the console. Default is TRUE.

    time_unit

    Character. Unit of time to report. One of "secs", "millisecs", or "mins".

    Value

    Returns the result of the pipeline step, unchanged. Timing messages are printed or logged separately.

    Examples

    library(dplyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘dplyr’
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:stats’:
#> 
#>     filter, lag
#> The following objects are masked from ‘package:base’:
#> 
#>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union
mtcars |>
  time_pipe(group_by(cyl), "grouping") |>
  time_pipe(summarise(avg_hp = mean(hp)), "aggregation")
#> [2025-08-14 19:16:37.097] grouping: 0.0031 secs elapsed
#> [2025-08-14 19:16:37.100] aggregation: 0.0048 secs elapsed
#> # A tibble: 3 × 2
#>     cyl avg_hp
#>   <dbl>  <dbl>
#> 1     4   82.6
#> 2     6  122. 
#> 3     8  209. 

mtcars |>
  mutate(hp2 = {
    Sys.sleep(1)
    hp * 2
  }) |>
  time_pipe("entire pipeline")
#> [2025-08-14 19:16:37.121] entire pipeline: 1.0032 secs elapsed
#>                      mpg cyl  disp  hp drat    wt  qsec vs am gear carb hp2
#> Mazda RX4           21.0   6 160.0 110 3.90 2.620 16.46  0  1    4    4 220
